titleStmt.title: The case of James Haviland, of the Isle of Purbeck, in the county of Dorset, presented to the view of every impartial reader; but more particularly to the inhabitants of the isle and county aforesaid.

notesStmt.note: Includes: "Inventory of goods ... seized, carried away, and sold."
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
